module.name: Feature Code Admin
module.changelog: *2.4.0.1* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0* Extension/dest registry, it translation *1.0.5.3* changed categories *1.0.5.2* added canuninstall = no for module admin, bump for rc1 *1.0.5.1* added candisable = no for module admin *1.0.5* Fix install bug with featurecode release *1.0.4* Add support for duplicate feature codes *1.0.3* Add he_IL translation *1.0.2* Fix minor font/display issues
